description: A punchline where the employee leaves work to have a good day.
title: Good Day
n_1: Alex arrived at work and saw Jamie at the desk.
c1_1: Hey Jamie, ready for another day?
n_2: Their boss entered the room with a serious expression.
n_3: The boss looked at them and smiled slightly.
n_4: The boss said, 'Have a good day,' so Alex left immediately.
